Package ChatServer

Class ClientProxy

  • java.lang.Object
    • ChatServer.ClientProxy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    public class ClientProxy
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Proxy for client, represents client on server side Contains information about the client, handles all requests and messages for client
    Author:
    Jonathan Robinson

      Get any stored messages for the client when they connect to the server
      private void getRecipient​(java.lang.String searchName)
      Search for active clients with desired username, if found the recipient is updated, if not outputs error message
      private void newRecipient​(ClientProxy newRecipient)
      Update current recipeint, not sure if this will be used just use getRecipient?
      void run()
      main run method, waits for message from client and uses switch statement to interpret what to do with the message
      private void sendMessage​(Message message)
      Send a message to the recipient if client currently has one, else output error message

        newInput - input stream to client for writting object
        ip - ip address of server
        newName - name of client
